name: Veact
tag_list: business-intelligence, saas, sales-analytics, automotive, after-sales-marketing, marketing-efficiency, sales-2-0
overview:
Veact provides SaaS applications for marketinganalysis and -planning to car dealers and serves as a marketing research firm for OEMs and importers.

The automotive industry is spending about 1/3 of it’s revenue on marketing&sales. Having thousands of independent dealers, Veact aim is to act as an independent service provider to improve marketing effectivness of the single dealer.

The After-Sales Marketing cockpit measures the success of after-sales marketing activities and adds value by providing benchmarking data from comparable campaigns to improve marketing efficency. The application focuses on:

  • intuitive usability ==> user is typical without specific marketing background
  • high performance ==> results are displayed within short period of time
  • bottom-line impact ==> our recommendations improve marketing efficency by at least 15% p.a. (proven with first reference customers)

The next product will be a lead management cockpit to give automotive dealers a chance to outsource their activities around lead qualification and management. Our multichannel platform serves online as well as offline leads and integrates in the sales process as a virtual assistant.

As a market research firm Veact provides OEMs, suppliers and CRM provider with unseen insights to customer behaviour at the POS as well as data to judge the effect of marketing measures.
